website_summaries.verdict: Well-priced, popular cleanser that gets the job done.
pros: Non-greasy, unscented formula that’s great for sensitive skin
Many long-term users are faithful to the product
cons: Doesn’t work as well on waterproof mascara

customer_reviews.title: Dessert island product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this since the late 80s and love that they haven’t changed the formula at all. It is the only product that removes 100% of stray mascara without leaving a filmy/greasy/slippery residue. I usually dip a Qtip into the container and touch up any mistakes or stuff I missed the night before. Love this and hope they never stop making it!!
customer_reviews.author: jth

customer_reviews.title: Fake! Knock off!
customer_reviews.text: This is a knock off! I have been a product user for 15 years. It is not the real product. Came not full and different bottle look and the fluid is bubbly!
customer_reviews.author: matthew comstock

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: It was taped up to not spill because it doesn’t have the seal on the bottle. Looks old or used, maybe refilled with water. I will not be using this because I don’t know what’s in it. Will ask for refund
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get staple  of face care got here fast and without shipping charges!
customer_reviews.text: This 15 yr staple of cleansing care for delicate skin is just no longer available where I am, so having Amazon get it to me fast and without shipping charges makes it even better!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Kealani Winter

customer_reviews.title: Non Allergenic.  Gentle to your eyes.  Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was having a severe allergic reaction to other makeup removers. Burning eyes, dry swollen skin in eye area. Eyes weeping constantly. Very uncomfortable. Immediate relief when I stopped using other brands and began using Clinique.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Reichenback

customer_reviews.title: Product was opened and used
customer_reviews.text: It was used. The lettering was faded, product had been opened. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine L. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Not oily
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years to remove eye makeup. Not oily!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Dyda-Schmid

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several different brands but this one is the best eyemakeup remover by far.
customer_reviews.author: Lukasz Krol

customer_reviews.title: I have used this eye makeup remover for almost 15 years ! Non- irritating & is refreshing
customer_reviews.text: Non- oily & rinsed off best with a warm damp washcloth
customer_reviews.author: C.T.

customer_reviews.title: This is a fake item. I have been using ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fake item. I have been using it for years and I bought one directly from Clinique to compare it and they do not work the same. This is fake.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Best eye make up remover ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this remover for as long as I can remember. I wear contacts and I have no problem removing mascara with this at all. It doesn't get goopy, or make my contacts cloudy etc. It lasts forever and you don't need to use a lot to remove your makeup. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen W.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!! Have used it for years. I consider it the best makeup remover. Doesn’t leave my eyes feeling greasy and gets even the thick and waterproof mascara off without destroying the skin on your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle O.

customer_reviews.title: Non greasy eye makeup remover
customer_reviews.text: It is a good no greasy eye makeup remover. Easy to put in a smaller bottle for travel. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Ilene B

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for years. It's the only thing I've found that doesn't burn my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: O. P.

customer_reviews.title: best eye makeup remover ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eye make-up remover I have ever used! It is Very gental on my skin and it doesn't burn if I get it in my eyes although I try not to ever get it in my eyes. I will never use a product other than this.
customer_reviews.author: RBayes

customer_reviews.title: make up remover
customer_reviews.text: My wife has used this product on a daily basis for years and asked for more. I guess that is a good review.
customer_reviews.author: Retiree

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive eyes and I have allergic reactions to most make removers. This product works well and does not cause a reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona C

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many other eyemakeup removers, but this one is extremely gentle on your skin and doesn't burn if you get it in your eyes. I use it to take off regular and waterproof mascara and it does the job well without leaving a greasy coating on your skin like the ones that have oil. I have sensitive skin and have never had any problems with irritation. It's fragrance free too. The bottle seems to last a long time. I'm thrilled with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: This product works good at taking off eye shadow, but it misses the mark on completely taking off eye liner and mascara. Next time I will buy the makeup remover from Clinique for lids, lashes and lips. I have used it and it works better.
customer_reviews.author: ShawnaB

product_meta.title: Rinse Off Eye Make Up Solvent Clinique 4.2 oz Eye Solvent For Unisex
product_meta.description: An oil-free eye makeup remover. Dissolves eye makeup without disturbing other makeup. Offers a quick and easy way for makeup changes. Provides a gentle and comfortable formula. Leaves skin feeling soft and clean. Ophthalmologist-tested.
feature_bullets: Dissolves eye makeup without disturbing other makeup
Offers a quick & easy way for makeup changes
Leaves skin feeling soft & clean. Ophthalmologist-tested.
